item.title: 奇货可居：拉詹谈日益增长的金融稳定风险（播客）
item.description: 黄金一直在飙升。风险资产（有一些小插曲）也一直在飙升。然而，央行行长们（尤其是美联储）却在降息。这是为什么呢？又是什么风险在作祟？在本期播客中，我们采访了芝加哥大学布斯商学院教授、印度储备银行前行长拉古拉姆-拉詹。拉詹是在金融大危机之前最早发出警报的人之一，他的名声非常响亮。【原文：Gold has been surging. Risky assets (with a few minor hiccups) have also been surging. And yet, central bankers (most notably the Fed) are in rate cutting mode. Why is this? And what kind of risks are being conjured up? On this episode of the podcast, we speak with Raghuram Rajan, a professor at the Booth School of Business at the University of Chicago, as well as the former Governor of the Reserve Bank of India. Rajan famously was one of the first to raise alarms prior to the Great Financial Cr】

item.title: 投资者大卫-马丁内斯祝贺萨瓦德尔抵御 BBVA
item.description: 萨瓦德尔银行（Banco Sabadell SA）股东大卫-马丁内斯（David Martinez）祝贺该银行在与西班牙对外银行（BBVA SA）的收购战中获胜，显然是想把与萨瓦德尔银行领导层的公开争吵抛诸脑后。【原文：Banco Sabadell SA shareholder David Martinez congratulated the lender on winning its battle against BBVA SA’s takeover effort, apparently seeking to put a public spat with Sabadell’s leadership behind him.】

item.title: 印度推动扩大与主要贸易伙伴的卢比结算范围
item.description: 一位熟知内情的人士说，印度央行正在采取积极措施，允许自由贸易伙伴更方便地用卢比与印度进行交易结算，此举可能有助于随着时间的推移提振本币。【原文：India’s central bank is taking active steps to allow free-trade partners to settle transactions with it more easily in the rupee, a person familiar with the matter said, a move that could help boost the local currency over time.】

item.title: 达喀尔筹资谈判继续进行，塞内加尔寻求迅速达成国际货币基金组织协议
item.description: 本周，塞内加尔继续在达喀尔与国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）的一个多边贷款人代表团举行会谈。【原文：Senegal intends to rapidly conclude a new International Monetary Fund program as talks continue with a delegation from the multilateral lender in Dakar this week.】

item.title: 首席财务官下台，B&M 因成本未达预期再次下调指导性目标
item.description: B&M European Value Retail SA 在发布利润预警仅两周后，再次下调了指导性目标，原因是发现了之前在展望中未计算在内的运费成本。【原文：B&M European Value Retail SA cut its guidance again just two weeks after issuing a profit warning, following the identification of freight costs that were previously unaccounted for in the outlook.】

item.title: 日本央行董事会鹰派人士呼吁加息，因为日本价格标准发生变化
item.description: 日本央行董事会成员高田恒指（Hajime Takata）表示，上调该行政策利率的时机已经成熟，他在上个月对维持政策稳定的决定提出异议后，超越了政治不稳定因素，重申了自己的信念。【原文：Bank of Japan Board Member Hajime Takata said the time is ripe for raising the bank’s policy interest rate, looking past political instability to reiterate his conviction after he dissented from a decision to hold policy steady last month.】

item.title: 贸易紧张局势缓解，中国经济前景看好，铜价攀升
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普寻求缓解与中国的贸易紧张局势，而中国政府也表示其经济可以实现今年的增长目标之后，铜价上涨了 1%以上。【原文：Copper advanced more than 1% after US President Donald Trump sought to ease trade tensions with China, while Beijing signaled its economy can meet growth targets for this year.】

item.title: 韩国称美国关税谈判取得 "实质性进展
item.description: 韩国最高政策负责人表示，韩国在与美国的关税谈判中就大多数关键问题取得了 "实质性进展"，在此之前的一个周末，首尔的顶级富豪们还参加了唐纳德-特朗普在其马阿拉歌庄园举行的高尔夫活动。【原文：South Korea’s top policy chief said the country made “substantial progress” on most key issues in tariff talks with the US, following a weekend of meetings that also saw Seoul’s top tycoons attend a golf event with Donald Trump at his Mar-a-Lago estate.】

item.title: 尽管贸易存在不确定性，越南仍将明年增长目标定为 10
item.description: 尽管美国关税和全球贸易不确定性有可能对出口和投资流动造成压力，越南政府仍将未来五年的年经济增长目标定为至少 10%。【原文：Vietnam’s government is targeting annual economic growth of at least 10% over the next five years, even as US tariffs and global trade uncertainty threaten to weigh on exports and investments flows.】

item.title: 在美国信贷紧张之际，全球银行在印度交易上投注数十亿美元
